title: Chloe Valdary 7: Managing the Hierarchy and Restraining the Barbarian Within
description:
Chloe and Karen discuss the necessity of hierarchies, the difference between power and competence, and the problem with barbarians, especially the barbarians that are within ourselves.
The longer conversation (which includes Chloe's life story, the intersection between her ideas and those of Jordan Peterson) is here:  https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytwQ
